mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(SUM(amount),0.00) FROM j_bonus_cj where status = 1 and to_days(now()) = to_days(create_time)
SELECT IFNULL(SUM(amount),0.00) FROM j_bonus_cj where status = 1 and YEARWEEK(date_format(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d')) = YEARWEEK(now())

select a.amount,b.cashScore,c.shoppingScore,d.elecScore,a.showTime from (select ifnull(sum(amount),0.00) as amount,date_format(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') as showTime from j_bonus_cj where status = 1 group by date_format(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d')) a
left join (select ifnull(sum(score),0.00) as cashScore,date_format(created_at, '%Y-%m-%d') as showTime from u_cash_score_balance where category = 5 and type = 1 and status = 1 and end = 2 group by date_format(created_at, '%Y-%m-%d')) b on a.showTime = b.showTime
left join (select ifnull(sum(score),0.00) as shoppingScore,date_format(created_at, '%Y-%m-%d') as showTime from u_shopping_score_balance where category = 5 and type = 1 and status = 1 and end = 2 group by date_format(created_at, '%Y-%m-%d')) c on a.showTime = c.showTime
left join (select ifnull(sum(score),0.00) as elecScore,date_format(created_at, '%Y-%m-%d') as showTime from u_elec_score_balance where category = 5 and type = 1 and status = 1 and end = 2 group by date_format(created_at, '%Y-%m-%d')) d on a.showTime = d.showTime
order by a.showTime desc
